lore: The lifespan of an Animation is very short, barely reaching three months, unless its creator or current master gives it a Spell Gem for it to absorb.\n\nThe Lip Animation cannot avoid eating or drinking whatever is in front of it, unless their master gives an order to the contrary every few minutes. Most of the time, food and liquid just pass through it, but boiling water or fish bones can cause serious damage to these creatures.
menagerieDialog: (This creature seems to lack any semblance of emotion. It is merely an animated object and nothing more.)
(Where did this body part come from, anyway?)
(You're nearly overwhelmed by the powerful magic that gives life to this creature.)
(The creature awaits your next command, living only to serve your needs. Pretty convenient, really.)
(If you combine each of the six known Animation creatures, perhaps something interesting will happen. But probably not.)
name: Lip Animation
